name: A Cube's Journey (Peyton Paul)
description:
Play as a sad and depressed small cube that has had his world turned to black and white due to his depression and sadness. After deciding to kill himself by drowning himself in the lake, he meets this old man at the lake that asks him if he can deliver this fruit up to the peak of Rainbow Mountain: A place full of color.

After agreeing, the small cube embarks on a journey to climb Rainbow Mountain and reach its peak, and in doing so finds his true purpose and happiness in life while fighting his inner demons. He also discovers a dark secret that the company: Blackrock Industries has been hiding away way up in Rainbow Mountain.

Platform your way through the 6 stages based on the colors of the rainbow in A Cube's Journey as you try to reach the peak of Rainbow Mountain!

A Cube's Journey is dedicated to Night in the Woods creator, Alec Holowka who died of Suicide in 2019.

Hope you Enjoy Playing!
